name: Assassin
description: A hired killer, sneakily taking lives for coin.

0.name: Sapient Bonuses
0.description: The listed statline assumes a human assassin. For assassins of other sapient species, add/subtract to this statline based off of how the base species differs from humans. For example, aelvezim have 2 less MGT than humans, so subtract 2 from the MGT score of the aelvezi assassin.

1.name: Inventory
1.description: Assassins always carry a shortsword, with a rondel dagger as backup. They sometimes wear gambesons for protection.
